name: celer-web-sdk
description: JavaScript library to interact with a local Celer node

scripts.bundle:browser: npx parcel build -d browser --out-file browser.js --global celer src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle:browser && npm run bundle:node
scripts.docs: npx typedoc --name "Celer Web SDK API Docs" --out docs --excludePrivate --disableOutputCheck --theme node_modules/typedoc-thunder-theme/bin/default src
scripts.demo: npm run build && npx parcel serve -d demoout demo/basic/index.html
scripts.demo-two: npm run build && npx parcel serve -d demoout demo/two-accounts/index.html
